context: Get by nth item​ | If you have a list of identical elements, and the only way to distinguish between them is the order, you can choose a specific element from a list with [locator.first()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-first), [locator.last()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-last) or [locator.nth()](/docs/api/class-locator#locator-nth).
